to submit comments to tne Food

the agency's plan to regulate the

afa news conference_

made public our comments to the
{na FSX
Speaking on behalf of tne industry
restaied the industry'$ commitment to
preveniing minors from having access to
cigarettes_
also outlined the
numerous reasons why we believe the FDA's plan to
regulate cigarettes is
iliega
and excessive
The FDA's proposal is not really about preventing youth
smoking_
FDA seeks to ban common promotional practices and impose
requirements tha1 would interfere with adults' choices and tne rights of cigarette
companies to sell a legal product.
A complete copy of my rerarks from todays
news conference is attached
would like to express senior managements heartfelt thanks t0 each of
wfeo
took the time TO contect the FDA on this most important issue
A specia
thank
Vou to fhose who went the extra mile by asking friends; family members and
business contacts to take action.
The FDA is required by Iav to catalogue &nd
evaluate each and every letter received_
We wvill pursue
fforts in the couns to prevent the FDA from seizing regulatory
control of our products.
We will keep you informed as developments occur
and
will also continue to let you know how you can most efiectively help t0 oppose
tha FDA's plan_
Thankyou again, and happy New Year to all.
